name: Phanes Orphic
description:
A short (5 - 10 min) game made in one week as part of a personal game jam challenge.

Fight off the swarm of enemies and protect the orphic egg! Fulfill your destiny on this sacred land and discover the truth about yourself and the orphic egg.

CONTROLLS: 

Start game and continue dialogue - Enter

Movement - WSAD

Melee attack - Arrow keys

Interact - E

Quit - Escape
